assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The researchers got institutional ethical permission, and students were introduced to informed consent for research participation. In the analysis phase, students (S) got their codes without naming their names or initials to ensure anonymity. The same codes were used in the citations of the research participants’ answers with the letter P for participants and NP for non-participants.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: A.A. is a certified trainer for the “Training of Trainers program” led by the education team at the Wikimedia Foundation. A.A. was not sponsored by the Wikimedia Foundation for the conduction of this research. M.T. declares that he has no conflict of interest.
